Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Driving North on Hiawatha Ave - saw two round lights over me - pulled over and got out of car. Observed two round white/yellow lights with red edge or aura around them moving northwest. One was moving around. The other traveling in a fairly straight line
divs: sighting detailsdriving north on hiawatha ave - saw two round lights over me - pulled over and got out of car. observed two silent round orb like white\yellow lights with red edge or aura around them slowly moving northwest. one was moving around. the other traveling in a fairly straight line. then observed a third object in the distance. the two began moving toward the third which then disappeared and the two original lights began ascending, and increased speed traveling northwest. started directly and only 500 feet above me - definitely not helicopters or airplanes.
